oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Historic sites; Clothing & dress; Valleys
Ganier, Albert Franklin, 1883-1973; York, Alvin Cullum, 1887-1964; Sergeant York (Motion picture)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A woman and three men walking toward a white-painted wooden gate overlooking a lovely valley.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert Franklin Ganier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The photograph is part of the research conducted for Warner Brothers Studio in preparation for the filming of the motion picture, "Sergeant York."
